sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private router:Router){ } ngOnInit(){ } login(){ console.log('hel') this.router.navigateByUrl('/admin/dashboard'); } }
